name: Married Man Makes My Girl His On-Site Wife
name_original: Married Man Makes My Girl His On-Site Wife
description:
Childhood friends You and Shiori have just started living together near campus.
Just before summer break, a man moved in next door with his young son.
You has been a little busy, so he didn't notice just how friendly the guy was with Shiori...
not until he found an amateur porn video featuring a girl who looked awfully familiar...
